DF_TEMPLATES.errorLibWrapperMissing: 'DF Template Enhancements' requires the 'libWrapper' module. Please install and activate 'libWrapper'.
DF_TEMPLATES.AutoTargetHint: If enabled, will automatically target tokens that are hit by a Measure Template
DF_TEMPLATES.SnapIntersectHint: Some rules systems (such as D&D 5e) state that spell templates should originate from a grid intersection.
DF_TEMPLATES.GridlessPointResolutionHint: How many points along each axis to generate for auto-targetting in gridless scenes (Example: for 3, there will be 3 x 3 = 9 points over each square). A higher number might cause slower performance with lots of tokens in a scene.
DF_TEMPLATES.GridlessPointPercentageHint: What percentage of points need to be within the template for it to highlight them. Setting this to 0 means just one point needs to be inside to be targetted.
DF_TEMPLATES.PreviewHint: Show the grid highlight and perform auto-targeting when moving or creating a template.
DF_TEMPLATES.SquareRotateHint: Square Templates do not keep their shape when rotating. This will correct the rotation so that a square template maintains its shape while rotating around the template's origin point.
DF_TEMPLATES.DebugName: [DEBUG Only] Display Auto-Target Point Grids and Test Grids
DF_TEMPLATES.DebugHint: For the purposes of debugging the auto-targetting feature, this option will display the points used for detecting token targeting in a gridless scene. Or will display the entire test zone for grid highlighting.

AngleSnap.MacroHint: How many snap points are available to rotate a template to. This can be used to reduce the number of angles a player has to choose from in order to speed up combat
AngleSnap.MicroHint: When holding Ctrl, you can perform smaller rotation snaps. This essentially multiplies the above setting by this amount to generate a sub-set of angle snaps. Setting this to 1 effectively disables micro angle steps.

center.label: Center Point
center.desc: (Default) The center point of each grid cell must be contained inside of the template for that cell to be highlighted.

touch.label: Touches
touch.desc: If Any part of a grid cell is Touched, that cell will be highlighted.

points.label: Point Grid (Experimental)
points.desc:
Highlight a grid square only if points on the square are inside the template. The number of points are based on the percent slider in the Gridless settings.
This is experimental and only used for token targetting. The grid highlight uses Touch Mode in order to test the tokens.
